item.title: Add paging to infinite scrolling
item.description:
This has been a long time problem that I have experienced in the them Madison2. When scrolling through a large album, especially on mobile or tablet, the site bogs down and stops loading images most likely due to a lack of resources on the client machine.
We need the ability to have adaptive scrolling with a MAX number of images for paging. This would keep the same fluid look and feel of the theme while allowing larger albums. I haven't really used my koken site in years due to this limitation and the fact that there wasn't a like/rating system.
Now that there is a like/ rate plugin, we are half way there.
P.S. You need a demo/ example site for your like/ rating plugin.
